behavior.name: init_submarine_with_com
behavior.author: FA
behavior.description: Behavior to start the submarine. Set mode of the control, wait for the mission switch and initialise the underwater communication.

param.name: sub_init_array
param.label: sub_init_array
param.hint: Sets the initial mission to do

param.name: other_sub_init_array
param.label: other_sub_init_array
param.hint: Sets the initial mission for the other sub to do
